descriptionHtml:
Black Rose Armor for CHSBHC

...............................[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25p1jxy.jpg[/IMG]......................................

=======Description============================
This is a conversion of N8k Black Rose Armor converted to fit CHSBHC body. The armor can be crafted at a forging station, with leather armor materials. The armor ratings of the set also matches to that of the leather set., and can be improved and enchanted. support weight slider (THANKS TO newmiller)
......[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/e5fzvr.jpg[/IMG].....
Install
======
Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder

Recommended:
========================
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation

                                              [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/24dr5tx.jpg[/IMG]
Credits and thanks: 
- Black Rose - UNPB TBBP by N8k (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46580//?)
author: gol
